programme.title: Laxfiske i Jemen
programme.desc: Brittisk dramakomedi från 2011. Fiskeexperten Alfred Jones mottar en förfrågan från en rik shejk om att införa laxfiske i Jemen. Statsministerns representant råkar höra om historien och engagerar sig i vad hon ser som ett goodwill-projekt. Trots Alfreds reservationer övertalar hon honom att åka till Jemen, vilket blir början på ett fantastiskt äventyr som förändrar hans liv.

programme.title: Happiest season
programme.desc: Amerikansk romantisk komedi från 2020. Att träffa din flickväns familj för första gången kan vara tufft. Att planera att fria på hennes familjs årliga julmiddag  tills du inser att de inte vet att hon är gay  är ännu svårare. När Abby får veta att Harper hållit deras relation hemlig för sin familj, börjar hon ifrågasätta flickvännen hon trodde hon kände.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad film från 2013. När snigeln Turbo en dag mirakulöst blir supersnabb så ger han sig ut på en resa för att att få tävla mot världens bästa racerförare Guy Gagne. Turbo blir kompis med ett gäng gatusmarta lirare och sätter sitt hjärta och skal på spel för att bevisa att ingen dröm är för stor, och ingen drömmare för liten.

programme.title: Boog & Elliot 3: Cirkusvänner

programme.title: Gnomeo och Julia
programme.desc: Brittisk-amerikanskt animerat äventyr från 2011. Trädgårdstomtarna Gnomeo och Julia har lika många hinder att överkomma som sina kvasinamnar när de hamnar mitt i en grannfejd. Men bland rosa plastflamingor och gräsklipparrallys, kan det unga paret finna varaktig lycka?

programme.title: Barbie: Pärlprinsessan
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad barnfilm från 2014. Lumina har inte bara kraften att ändra färg på pärlor, hon är också en bra frisör. Med Royal Ball bara några timmar bort, kommer hon att följa ödet och bli kungarikets pärlprinsessa?

programme.title: Madagaskar 2
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad komedi från 2008. Djuren från New Yorks Zoo som hamnat på en strand i Madagaskar längtar tillbaka till storstaden. I ett flyplan reparerat av pingviner lämnar de ön, men det blir en kort resa. De kraschar i Afrikas djungel, och nu får de för första gången stifta bekantskap med sina släktingar i det vilda.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: Amerikansk animerad film från 2013. När snigeln Turbo en dag mirakulöst blir supersnabb så ger han sig ut på en resa för att att få tävla mot världens bästa racerförare Guy Gagne. programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: A primatologist has a closer bond with George, a friendly gorilla that he's raised since infanthood, than he does with any humans, but when the animal is exposed to a genetic experiment it grows to a massive size and goes on a destructive rampage.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Dynamite
programme.desc: A preview of the Full Gear event available November 13 on pay-per-view.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: After a research vessel is attacked, a prehistoric shark that was believed to be long-since extinct is found living in the ocean's deepest depths, and as it emerges to shallower waters a rescue diver who encountered it years prior must stop it.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: After a research vessel is attacked, a prehistoric shark that was believed to be long-since extinct is found living in the ocean's deepest depths, and as it emerges to shallower waters a rescue diver who encountered it years prior must stop it.

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Thirteen years after the murder of his partner's daughter, a former FBI detective uncovers a lead that may bring closure to the case.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride must protect a beloved family friend who is engaged to the number one suspect in the ongoing NCIS and FBI cartel case.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Sebastian is sent undercover and Patton exercises his former gambling skills, as Pride and the team attempt a dangerous operation to trap Garcia.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team protects a local DJ from a threatening perpetrator and investigates the murder of a navy captain who was attacked while on-air with the radio show. Also, Pride's daughter, Laurel, returns home to discuss her future plans.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS Special Agent Brody believes that a sailor hit by a party bus in the French Quarter is connected to her sister's death after the team discovers similarities between the two. Also, the team prepares for St. Patrick's Day festivities in New Orleans.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team discovers a surveillance van filled with photos documenting Special Agent Pride's every move after his daughter is attacked on campus and placed in protective custody.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a Navy lieutenant during a French Quarter second line funeral procession, a New Orleans tradition that celebrates the recently deceased with a musical parade.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After a navy lieutenant dies during a clandestine visit to a general's hotel room, Special Agent Pride and the team are asked to break standard protocol for the murder investigation.

programme.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: Five years after the Lego planet was invaded by the Duplo world, its people live in an apocalyptic wasteland. When the Master Builder Wyldstyle is abducted, the always-cheerful Emmet is forced to get serious and travel across the galaxy to save her.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human, half-vampire grandson doesn't seem to be showing any signs of being a monster, Dracula and his pals put the boy through a rigorous monster boot camp to bring out his vampire side.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: An unusual pet spawns a legion of vicious monsters who cause unstoppable chaos.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket lives in a tiny house with his parents and grandparents, and would like nothing more than to win a tour of Willy Wonka's chocolate factory. The adventure begins when he miraculously finds the last golden ticket in a chocolate bar.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After Pride travels to a deep-sea oil rig for a murder investigation, the team uncovers a gas leak that's on the verge of causing a catastrophic explosion. Also, Sebastian starts his NCIS special agent training at FLETEC.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After thousands of classified government files are stolen, the team searches for an underground group of hackers co-founded by Pride's old contact, Elvis Bertrand. Also, Sebastian joins the team as a newly minted NCIS Special Agent.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team partners with Homeland Security after the murder of a Navy master diver is linked to chatter of a foreign attack on the city.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team uncovers a mole in the ranks while working with the Department of Homeland Security to locate 900 missing pounds of explosives that pose an imminent threat to New Orleans.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team partners with several federal agencies to track a sniper who is targeting crowded events in the city.Guests: Steven Weber, Derek Webster, Jared Day, Doris Morgado, Steven Waldren, Kwajaylyn Brown, Lenita Henderson..

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride faces further backlash from the FBI when he helps former Navy Intelligence Analyst Elvis Bertrand, who is the lead suspect in a multiple homicide case.Guests: Tom Arnold, Grace..

programme.desc: After a decorated petty officer is found dead inside a sports arena, evidence leads Pride and the team to a kidnapping case of a petty officer who was last seen in Mexico.

programme.title: Open By Christmas
programme.desc: Nicky receives an unopened Christmas card from a secret admirer. She and Simone, her friend, attempt to track down the anonymous author.

programme.title: A Christmas Tree Grows in Colorado
programme.desc: A woman is planning the town's Christmas celebration and must win over a firefighter in order to obtain his beautiful spruce for the tree lighting.

programme.desc: A woman is planning the town's Christmas celebration and must win over a firefighter in order to obtain his beautiful spruce for the tree lighting.

programme.title: The Christmas House
programme.desc: When a TV star's parents ask him to bring back a revered family tradition, he revisits the family's traditions and brings back the magic of Christmases past.

programme.title: Christmas Comes Twice
programme.desc: A top newscaster finds herself regretting letting her man go five years ago. When a Christmas carnival comes to town, she is brought back in time to reconnect with him.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: A recently single travel writer is forced to share a cabin due to a mix up on her holiday vacation. What is an annoyance at first quickly changes to a new romance.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: The author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays.

programme.title: Chateau Christmas
programme.desc: A world-famous pianist returns The Chateau at Christmas to spend the holiday with her family and rediscover her passion for music.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: While planning a final Christmas gala at the exquisite Ashford Estate, a house manager falls for the handsome executor of the estate.

programme.title: Christmas Waltz
programme.desc: After a woman's storybook Christmas wedding is canceled, a dance instructor helps her face her fears in life and fulfill her dream of learning to dance.

programme.title: Coyote Creek Christmas
programme.desc: During a.

programme.title: Christmas Sail
programme.desc: A woman returns home for the holidays to take care of her estranged father, give her daughter a perfect Christmas, and reconnect with her best friend.

programme.title: Open By Christmas
programme.desc: Nicky receives an unopened Christmas card from a secret admirer. She and Simone, her friend, attempt to track down the anonymous author.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: After taking a Family Tree DNA test, Vanessa learns of a family that she didn't even know existed, and decides to travel to their home for the holidays.

programme.title: Gingerbread Miracle
programme.desc: Two old high school friends spend Christmas trying to sell one of their uncle's Mexican bakery that's known for their gingerbread cookies that magically grant wishes.

programme.desc: Two old high school friends spend Christmas trying to sell one of their uncle's Mexican bakery that's known for their gingerbread cookies that magically grant wishes.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: Former classmates find themselves travelling home together for the holidays. When a storm hits, they must work together to each get to their destination.

programme.title: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A single mother who's lost all interest in Christmas finds just what she needs when her uncle comes to visit.

programme.title: A Cheerful Christmas
programme.desc: As a 'Christmas Coach' a woman provides her clients with all the magic of the holidays. In order to make her new clients vision a success, she is tasked with working with their son, to find out all of their holiday traditions.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: A free-spirited former Graceland tour guide, awaiting news of her dream museum job, meets a busy single father on a Graceland tour and agrees to be his temporary nanny for the holidays.

programme.title: With Love, Christmas
programme.desc: An ad executive and her uptight co-worker must create the ultimate Christmas commercial. To complicate things, they are also each-others Secret Santa.

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: A self-professed 'Christmas hater' is locked in a department store on Christmas Eve. There, she meets a woman who claims to be her 'guardian angel' and shares with her three Christmas ghosts.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two co-workers vying for the same promotion are tasked with creating a 12 Days of Christmas scavenger hunt to promote the premiere of a new hotel.

programme.title: Christmas in Harmony
programme.desc: A music executive expects a holiday promotion, but instead goes home to North Carolina in order to win her job back. Meanwhile, she is also co-directing the church choir with her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Good Morning Christmas!
programme.desc: Two squabbling TV hosts are sent to a festive small town over Christmas. While pretending to get along for the sake of appearance, they discover that there's more to each other than they thought.
